bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with mian pao 面皰 , facial blister. BJ Substance Entry mu lan 木蘭：主身 大熱在皮膚中，去面熱赤皰酒皶，惡風癲疾，陰下癢濕，明耳目 , “It controls massive body heat in the skin and removes facial heat with red blisters and wine sediments, malign wind, the ailment of peak-illness, and itching with moisture below one’s yin (i.e. intimate) region, and it clears the ears and eyes”.
